Address.label: Address
Address.value: 128 SPRING STREET,BUILDING C - SUITE 500, LEXINGTON, Massachusetts, 02421, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Curis Inc is a biotechnology company that develops and commercializes innovative drugs and therapies in the immuno-oncology and precision oncology therapeutic areas. The company targets solid tumors, diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, advanced solid tumors or lymphomas, hematological cancers, and others. Its pipeline products include Fimepinostat, CA-170, CA-4948, CA-327, and Erivedge.
